cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinrai

sentence.kanji: 私は部下を信頼しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha buka wo shinrai shite imasu
sentence.english: I trust my subordinates.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's irai

sentence.kanji: 彼に協力を依頼しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ni kyouryoku wo irai shimashita
sentence.english: I requested his cooperation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tayoru

sentence.kanji: 人に頼らないで、自分でやってごらん。
sentence.romaji: hito ni tayoranai de jibun de yate goran
sentence.english: Do it yourself without relying on other people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanomi

sentence.kanji: あなたに頼みがあるんですけど。
sentence.romaji: anata ni tanomi ga aru n desu kedo
sentence.english: By the way, I have a favor to ask you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanomoshii

sentence.kanji: 彼は頼もしい人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tanomoshii hito desu
sentence.english: He's a dependable person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juuyaku

sentence.kanji: 明日、重役会議が開かれます。
sentence.romaji: asu juuyakukaigi ga hirakaremasu
sentence.english: The executive meeting will be held tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kewashii

sentence.kanji: 父の表情が険しくなったの。
sentence.romaji: chichi no hyoujou ga kewashiku nata no
sentence.english: My father's expression became grim.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seibi

sentence.kanji: 車は整備に出しています。
sentence.romaji: kuruma ha seibi ni dashite imasu
sentence.english: I've put my car in for maintenance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiri

sentence.kanji: 古い服を整理しました。
sentence.romaji: furui fuku wo seiri shimashita
sentence.english: I sorted out the old clothes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chousei

sentence.kanji: 今、スケジュールの調整をしています。
sentence.romaji: ima sukeju-ru no chousei wo shite imasu
sentence.english: I'm adjusting the schedule now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's totonou

sentence.kanji: パーティーの準備が整いました。
sentence.romaji: pa-tei- no junbi ga totonoimashita
sentence.english: The preparations for the party are all in order.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shumoku

sentence.kanji: その選手は2種目でメダルを取ったわ。
sentence.romaji: sono senshu ha nishumoku de medaru wo tota wa
sentence.english: The athlete won medals in two events.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanataba

sentence.kanji: 卒業式に花束をもらいました。
sentence.romaji: sotsugyoushiki ni hanataba wo moraimashita
sentence.english: I got a bouquet of flowers at my graduation ceremony.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoken

sentence.kanji: あなたは保険に加入していますか。
sentence.romaji: anata ha hoken ni kanyuu shite imasu ka
sentence.english: Have you taken out insurance?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kandou

sentence.kanji: 感動する映画でした。
sentence.romaji: kandou suru eiga deshita
sentence.english: It was a moving film.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousokudouro

sentence.kanji: 高速道路は混んでたよ。
sentence.romaji: kousoku douro ha kon deta yo 。
sentence.english: There was a lot of traffic on the expressway.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zensokuryoku

sentence.kanji: 久しぶりに全速力で走りました。
sentence.romaji: hisashiburi ni zensokuryoku de hashirimashita
sentence.english: I ran at full speed for the first time in a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taijuu

sentence.kanji: 私は毎朝体重を測っています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha maiasa taijuu wo hakate imasu
sentence.english: I weigh myself every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's undoukai

sentence.kanji: 運動会で一位になったよ。
sentence.romaji: undoukai de ichii ni nata yo
sentence.english: We won the first place in the athletic meet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juuten

sentence.kanji: 子供の自主性に重点を置いています。
sentence.romaji: kodomo no jishusei ni juuten wo oite imasu
sentence.english: I put an emphasis on children's autonomy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuukan

sentence.kanji: この週刊誌を毎週買っているの。
sentence.romaji: kono shuukanshi wo maishuu kate iru no
sentence.english: I buy this weekly magazine every week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gekan

sentence.kanji: この雑誌は月刊ですか。
sentence.romaji: kono zashi ha gekan desu ka
sentence.english: Is this magazine monthly?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiretsu

sentence.kanji: 体育館に行って整列しなさい。
sentence.romaji: taiikukan ni ite seiretsu shinasai
sentence.english: Go to the gymnasium and line up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amari

sentence.kanji: 余りは次回使いましょう。
sentence.romaji: amari ha jikai tsukaimashou
sentence.english: Let's use the left-over portion next time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yochi

sentence.kanji: 彼に言い訳の余地はありません。
sentence.romaji: kare ni iiwake no yochi ha arimasen
sentence.english: He doesn't have room for excuses.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokei

sentence.kanji: 余計なことを言ってはだめよ。
sentence.romaji: yokei na koto wo ite ha dame yo
sentence.english: Don't say things you don't need to say.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yobun

sentence.kanji: 食事は余分に用意してあります。
sentence.romaji: shokuji ha yobun ni youi shite arimasu
sentence.english: I've prepared some extra portions for the meal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tochuu

sentence.kanji: 途中で30分ほど休みましょう。
sentence.romaji: tochuu de 30 pun hodo yasumimashou
sentence.english: Let's take a rest on the way for about 30 minutes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youto

sentence.kanji: この道具の用途を説明します。
sentence.romaji: kono dougu no youto wo setsumei shimasu
sentence.english: I'll explain how to use this tool.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuuto

sentence.kanji: 私は中途採用で入社しました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha chuuto saiyou de nyuusha shimashita
sentence.english: I entered the company as a mid-career worker.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakujo

sentence.kanji: 要らないファイルは削除して下さい。
sentence.romaji: iranai fuairu ha sakujo shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please delete unneeded files.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's roudousha

sentence.kanji: 労働者がストをしたそうだよ。
sentence.romaji: roudousha ga suto wo shita sou da yo
sentence.english: I hear that the workers went on strike.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's roudou

sentence.kanji: 彼らは1日7時間労働している。
sentence.romaji: karera ha 1 nichi 7 jikan roudou shite iru
sentence.english: They've been working for seven hours a day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishu

sentence.kanji: これは一種独特の味がするね。
sentence.romaji: kore ha ishu dokutoku no aji ga suru ne
sentence.english: This has an unusual sort of taste.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinchou

sentence.kanji: もう一度慎重に見直しましょう。
sentence.romaji: mouichido shinchou ni minaoshimashou
sentence.english: Let's carefully review it again.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchuu

sentence.kanji: 宇宙の謎は限りなく大きいの。
sentence.romaji: uchuu no nazo ha kagiri naku ookii no
sentence.english: The mystery of space is infinitely deep.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jisoku

sentence.kanji: 新幹線の最高時速は300キロです。
sentence.romaji: shinkansen no saikou jisoku ha sanbyakukiro desu
sentence.english: The highest speed of the shinkansen bullet train is 300 km/h.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sokudo

sentence.kanji: 新幹線の速度はどれくらいですか。
sentence.romaji: shinkansen no sokudo ha dore kurai desu ka
sentence.english: How fast is the speed of the Shinkansen?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miki

sentence.kanji: この木の幹はとても太いよ。
sentence.romaji: kono ki no miki ha totemo futoi yo
sentence.english: The trunk of this tree is very thick.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hataraki

sentence.kanji: 部下が素晴らしい働きをしたな。
sentence.romaji: buka ga subarashii hataraki wo shita na
sentence.english: My subordinates did some fantastic work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kishi

sentence.kanji: 船がやっと岸に着いたよ。
sentence.romaji: fune ga yato kishi ni tsuita yo
sentence.english: The ship finally reached the shore.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juushi

sentence.kanji: あの企業では学歴が重視されるよ。
sentence.romaji: ano kigyou de ha gakureki ga juushi sareru yo
sentence.english: An educational background is valued in that company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's totonoeru

sentence.kanji: 彼はスピーチの前に服装を整えた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha supi-chi no mae ni fukusou wo totonoeta
sentence.english: He straightened up his clothes before the speech.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuusoku

sentence.kanji: あの国の経済は急速に発展しているのね。
sentence.romaji: ano kuni no keizai ha kyuusoku ni haten shite iru no ne
sentence.english: That country's going through rapid economic development.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naname

sentence.kanji: ここに斜めに線を引いてください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni naname ni sen wo hiite kudasai
sentence.english: Please draw a line here diagonally.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jokou

sentence.kanji: この先は徐行して下さい。
sentence.romaji: kono saki ha jokou shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please go slowly ahead.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoutotsu

sentence.kanji: そこの角で車同士が衝突したのよ。
sentence.romaji: soko no kado de kuruma doushi ga shoutotsu shita no yo
sentence.english: The cars collided into each other at the corner there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omomi

sentence.kanji: 雪の重みで枝が折れそうだ。
sentence.romaji: yuki no omomi de eda ga ore sou da
sentence.english: The branch looks like it might snap due to the weight of the snow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoyuu

sentence.kanji: 出発まで時間の余裕があります。
sentence.romaji: shupatsu made jikan no yoyuu ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's plenty of time until departure.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanjin

sentence.kanji: 何事も最初が肝心だ。
sentence.romaji: nanigoto mo saisho ga kanjin da
sentence.english: In all things, it's the beginning that counts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's engan

sentence.kanji: 今日は沿岸の波が荒いでしょう。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha engan no nami ga arai deshou
sentence.english: The waves on the coast will be rough today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakushu

sentence.kanji: 図書館には各種の雑誌が揃っています。
sentence.romaji: toshokan ni ha kakushu no zashi ga sorote imasu
sentence.english: There are various magazines in the library.
